# Schedule 
_Last Updated: `r format(Sys.time(), "%a %b %d %X")`_


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Read in schedule
raw_detail <- read_excel("schedule_485.xlsx", sheet="schedule")

cdat <- raw_detail %>% mutate(Date = format(date, "%m/%d"))

#cdat$Assignments <- gsub(" (", " <b> (", cdat$Assignments, fixed=TRUE)
#cdat$Assignments <- gsub(" )", ")</b>", cdat$Assignments, fixed=TRUE)
```

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
out <- cdat %>% select(Week, Date, Topic, `Learning Objectives` = SLO, Prepare, Notes)

knitr::kable(out, align="cclll", escape=FALSE) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "striped", "responsive", "bordered"), 
                position='center') %>% 
  column_spec(1, width="5%") %>% 
  column_spec(2, width="5%") %>% 
  column_spec(3, width="20%") %>% 
  column_spec(4, width="30%") %>% 
  column_spec(5, width="20%")  %>% 
  column_spec(6, width="10%") 
```
